// Custome Exception
class InvalidDataException extends Exception 
{
	
String printProblem()
{
	
	return "Data is Not Valid";
}
	
}




class AskForum
{
	
	public void askQuestions(String quest) throws InvalidDataException
	{
		
		if(quest!=null)
		{
		System.out.println("Quesytion is:"+quest);
		}
		else if(quest==null)
		{
		throw new InvalidDataException();
			
		}
	}
}


public class ExcpDemo {

	public static void main(String[] args)  
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	/*	AskForum obj=new AskForum();
		try
		{
		obj.askQuestions(null);
		}catch(InvalidDataException ie)
		{
		//	System.out.println(ie.printProblem());
		
		ie.printStackTrace();
		}
	*/	
		
		
	try
	{
	int a=10/0;
	
	System.out.println(a);
	}catch(ArithmeticException ae)
	{
		throw new ArithmeticException("Ur trying to divide a number by zero");
		//System.out.println(ae.getMessage());
		//ae.printStackTrace();
	}

	
	}}
